Text: Some may be surprised why there is "buy license" in "Help section". The registration is needed only for one thing - if you haven?t already registered StarBurn the Registration Software dialog appears every time you connect a remote iSCSI device.  But is higly unlikely that you will want to remotely use my DVD burner :-D If so you will have to buy a license ;-)

Thanks for this whole information. Can anyone tell me if I can add more than 15 characters as a Disc name in DVD-Video compilation? Nero never supports it.

Thanks.
The crazy thing about this software, is you can not burn wave files, which the the supported CD player file format.
